content.description: This route is a link up climbing the best parts of Geiger Sanction and Oh Promise Me. Start as of Geiger Sanction climb to the ledge. Instead of heading right and up to the summit traverse left towards Don Juan around the corner. Down climb a bit to a small vertical seam. (You can belay from here on small gear if you wish) continue traversing over to the Oh Promise Me corner. Continue up the last half of Oh Promise.I  just made up a name so I could throw it on here and hopefully others can enjoy it also.
content.location: Starts on Geiger Sanction traverse to Oh Promise Me.

content.description: Easy climbing to an awkward ledge, good enough for " squatting room only". Reach up for a bomber under cling, get situated into a layback, pull up to the next slot in the crack. Top out on less than ideal rock. Continue on to the Two bolt anchor.
content.protection: Small gear, Two bolt anchor. *no rap rings*
content.location: Right facing left leaning corner 10ft to the right of Jamin.

climbs.name: Oh Promise Me
climbs.fa: Warren Musselman and John Anderson, ca. 1979-1980

content.description: Follows an inside corner into a chimney which spits you out onto a small ledge. Takes OK gear.
content.protection: Latest update says the anchors are bolted.
content.location: You can walk off/gain access to the top so long as the Poison Ivy isn't too bad.

content.description:
A recently bolted line that appears to be a direct start to Noncensus by climbing the overhanging face on good holds, mantling onto the ledge halfway up the route seemed to be the crux, then delicate vertical climbing past a bolt to the chains.  The bolts are closely spaced by stover standards. 

  - I do not know who bolted this, I only climbed it.
content.location: Starts where the under cliff trail narrows with the fixed cable below the overhanging face.

content.description: Slightly overhanging and fun, but also dirty and not often climbed.
content.protection: No bolts and a top roped setup is a bit involved without trad gear.
content.location: Start to the right of Oh Promise Me. Straight up and to the right of the overhang with 2 bolts (Intimidation Syndrome)

content.description:
This area is between Hawk's Nest to the left, and the Joshua Wall to the right. The trail is at its narrowest here, and one section typically has a fixed line to use as a handrail. 

  Routes, left to right: 

  The Diamond 5.10c TR **   Noncensus Direct 5.10d *** 7 bolts   Noncensus 5.9 R * 

Sim's Noncensus (variation) 5.10c **** (#? bolts)   Noncensus Redirect 5.12 *** # bolts   Nothing Yet 5.8 R *   Nothing Yet (variation 1) 5.8 TR *   Oh Promise Me 5.4 PG **   Intimidation Syndrome 5.10a PG/R * 2 bolts   The Hearth 5.8 PG/R *   Don Juan 5.11c * 1 bolt   Geiger Sanction 5.6 PG *   Falling Cedar 5.7 PG/R *   Jammin 5.1 G *   Squatting Room Only 5.6+ R **
